name: Dr. Meat
description:
Dr. Meat

This Game is for Godot Wild Jam 53

The Theme for the Game jam was

I used this theme in an interesting way that I Hope you will enjoy!

You will have to find ten fingers (you can only hold 1 at a time) you will put theme in a grinder. once you put all ten fingers in The boss will activate!

I made the game with wodsobe(check his stuff out) he made the music, models, and sound effects.
